long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focusing on our work in these days is really hard because we are living in the world of distractions. many times, we unconsciously type facebook or youtube. At that moment, focusing is already failed. 
Foxus is right chose for this problem. By raising cute fox, we can be motivated to study because fox will leave you if you enter blocked website.
